content:
Amazon CTO, Werner Vogels, stops by to help us explore his tech predictions for 2026 and beyond. Will companionship be redefined by consumer robots? Will quantum-safe become the only safe worth talking about? Is this the dawn of the renaissance developer? We're infinitely curious why Werner came to this particular set of conclusions. Are you? :link: https://changelog.fm/669

Ch Start Title Runs
01 00:00 Welcome to The Changelog 01:11
02 01:11 Sponsor: Tiger Data 01:39
03 02:50 Start the show! 01:10
04 04:00 Being Amazon CTO 06:18

10 43:08 Props to S3 04:13
11 47:21 Remain curious 13:07
12 1:00:29 Sponsor: Notion 01:32

14 1:03:32 The renaissance dev 16:13
15 1:19:45 On code review 04:02
16 1:23:47 Take it slow 02:41
17 1:26:27 Bonus prediction 01:48
18 1:28:15 Wrapping up 00:44
19 1:29:00 Closing thoughts (sotl!) 01:45
Interesting to hear about post quantum crypto. When I was at Dashlane (1Password competitor) a few years ago, we were already mostly done changing things over
I think if y'all are interested doing more of a deep dive on Post Quantum Cryptography, Filippo Valsorda (https://filippo.io/) would be an excellent guest
